alert.note: Alert for Labette; Neosho (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 9:09AM CDT until May 08 at 10:13AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Neosho River at Oswego affecting Cherokee and Labette Counties. Neosho River near Erie affecting Neosho County. Neosho River near Chanute affecting Allen and Neosho Counties. Neosho River near Parsons affecting Neosho and Labette Counties. For the Neosho River...including Iola, Chanute, Erie, Parsons, Oswego...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neosho River near Parsons. * WHEN...Until late Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:01 AM CDT Friday the stage was 25.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Neosho River Parsons 21.0 25.1 Fri 8 am CDT 24.4 16.2 11.0 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
